name: Brother P-Touch, PTH110BP, Easy Portable Label Maker Bundle (4 Label Tapes Included), White, Small
short_description: Professional Performance: Transform your organization with this Brother P-Touch label maker machine, featuring an intuitive QWERTY keyboard and preview display for perfect, professional-looking labels every time

Versatile Design: Your Brother P-Touch label maker delivers 3 professional fonts, 14 decorative frames, and over 250 symbols - perfect for small business organization, storage bins, file folders, and cable management

Superior Durability: Experience exceptional label quality with Brother P-Touch TZe tapes, featuring laminated, water-resistant construction that withstands fading, peeling, and harsh conditions - indoors and outdoors

Complete Label Solution: This Brother P-Touch bundle includes four label tapes - one sample black-on-white tape and three full-length black-on-white tapes (12 mm width) to tackle all your labeling projects immediately

Smart Features: Maximize efficiency with one-touch keys, built-in memory storing up to 15 labels for quick reprinting, and versatile power options - use 6 AAA batteries or an AC adapter (sold separately) for continuous use
product_description: Elevate your organization with the Brother P-Touch PTH110BP label maker machine, the perfect solution for professional-grade labeling needs. This portable label printer combines versatility with precision, making it ideal for small business owners and home organizers seeking efficient solutions. The intuitive QWERTY keyboard and easy-view display ensure precise control over your label design. Create professional-looking labels with up to two lines of text on labels up to 12 mm wide. Select from three distinct fonts, 14 stylish frames, and over 250 symbols to personalize your labels exactly how you want them. This label maker excels in versatility, perfect for organizing your home office, garage, kitchen, or workplace. Label storage bins, file folders, shelves, and cables with confidence. The convenient cable labeling feature helps maintain a tidy workspace by clearly identifying wires and cables. Experience unmatched durability with Brother P-Touch TZe tapes. These professional-grade labels feature a unique laminated design that protects your text, making them resistant to water, fading, peeling, and extreme temperatures. Whether used indoors or outdoors, these labels maintain their clarity. The comprehensive bundle includes one sample black-on-white label tape and three full-length black-on-white TZe laminated label tapes (12 mm width x 8 m length). The label maker supports various TZe tape widths from 3.5 mm to 12 mm. Enhance your labeling experience with smart features: one-touch keys provide quick access to common functions, while the built-in memory stores up to 15 frequently used labels for instant reprinting. Power your label maker with 6 AAA batteries for portable use, or connect an AC adapter (sold separately). For optimal performance, use only genuine Brother P-Touch TZe tapes and follow the included care instructions, such as avoiding exposure to extreme conditions and keeping the print head clean.

short_description: COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: Portable Label Maker As a handheld label maker, this device stands out with its lightweight and compact nature, making labeling a convenient task in any location.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR LABELS: Sticker Label Maker This unique handheld label maker offers an array of styles, with 5 font sizes, 7 print styles, and 8 box styles. Unleash the color label maker in you and print your customized labels with ease.

product_description: Discover the convenience of organization with the DYMO LetraTag 100H Handheld Label Maker, designed to bring ease to both your home and office. Compact and lightweight, this portable label maker renders labeling virtually anything as effortless as it gets, anywhere you go. The product offers the ability to print custom labels to match your needs. It encourages you to experiment with your creativity by providing 5 different font sizes, 7 print styles, and 8 box styles. What sets this label maker apart is its unique feature to preview text effects; it boasts a graphical display that enables you to see the font changes on screen before deciding to print. This eliminates guesswork, ensuring you're pleased with your creation each time you print. The LetraTag 100H is conscious about conserving power, featuring an auto-off functionality, which activates when the label maker is not in use. To further complement your experience, each order comes with three bonus label tapes. These include 1 LT paper label black on white cassette, 1 LT plastic label black on white cassette, and 1 LT plastic label black on clear cassette. Small in size but packed with features, this sleek and super portable handheld label maker adds a touch of convenience to your life. Highlights of key product characteristics are 9 label memory, 2 line printing, a date stamp, and an auto-off power saver. With the LetraTag 100H, embrace a well-organized lifestyle today!
